challenge_info.description: Persona-based Document Intelligence for Mobile App Accessibility Testing

documents.title: User Feedback Analysis - Accessibility Issues in Mobile Banking App
Usability Study Report - Visual Accessibility in Banking App Interfaces
Accessibility-Driven Interface Enhancements for Mobile Banking App

job_to_be_done.task: Identify major usability pain points for users with visual impairments and propose actionable interface improvements to meet accessibility standards.
